item.title: Lisa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Joseph Joubert
item.description: "The worst thing about new books is that they keep us from reading the old ones." -- Joseph Joubert

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Gamble everything for love, if you're a true human being." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "This is how I would die into the love I have for you: As pieces of cloud dissolve in sunlight." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Love is the whole thing. We are only pieces." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "I am yours. Don't give myself back to me." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your magnificence has made me a wonder. Your charm has taught me the way of love." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Whenever we manage to love without expectations, calculations, negotiations, we are indeed in heaven." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "There are no edges to my loving now." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Whenever we can manage to love without expectations, calculations, negotiations, we are indeed in heaven." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by oscar wilde
item.description: "You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear." -- oscar wilde

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "When you love you should not think you can direct the course of love, for love, if it finds you worthy, directs your course." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself, Love possesses not nor would it be possessed: For love is sufficient unto love." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Love is the only freedom in the world because it so elevates the spirit that the laws of humanity and the phenomena of nature do not alter its course." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "And think not you can direct the course of love, for love, if it finds you worthy, directs your course." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Lisa add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī
item.description:
"The heart is a The thousand-stringed instrument
That can only be tuned with Love." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "Nothing evolves us like love." -- Hafiz

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I want To do with you what spring does with the cherry trees." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Take bread away from me, if you wish, take air away, but do not take from me your laughter." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Of everything I have seen, it’s you I want to go on seeing: of everything I’ve touched, it’s your flesh I want to go on touching. I love your orange laughter. I am moved by the sight of you sleeping." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Till I loved I never lived." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Elizabeth Barrett Browning
item.description: "I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you" -- Elizabeth Barrett Browning

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Elizabeth Barrett Browning
item.description: "I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out." -- Elizabeth Barrett Browning
